articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Industrial Establishments
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Industrial Establishments
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Pukjung Machine Complex and the Rakwon Machine Complex.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the Pukjung Machine Complex.
					
					 He first looked round the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room devoted to the history of the complex, conducted by its officials.
					
					 The complex, which started with manufacturing hot-bulb engines after the war, has turned into a large machine-building center making a great contribution to the nation's shipbuilding industry and the development of economy under the wise guidance and meticulous care of President Kim Il Sung, he said, adding that the undying revolutionary exploits of the President will remain brilliantly recorded in the history of the country.
					
					 He made the rounds of the Assembling Shop and various other production processes and new machines produced by the complex to acquaint himself in detail with the updating and production there.
					
					 After learning in detail about the performance and mechanism and principles of operation of the newly manufactured machines, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the complex produced efficient machines as required by the new century by devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm. And he highly appreciated their feats.
					
					 The complex has a very important duty and role to play for firmly reinforcing the nation's shipbuilding industry and independent national economy, he noted, putting forward the highly important tasks to be fulfilled by the complex.
					
					 The complex has a brilliant tradition as it has taken the lead in devotedly implementing the Party's economic policies by giving full play to the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance in every annual of the Korean revolution, he said, expressing great expectation and conviction that all the Party members and other working people of the complex would successfully carry out in the future, too, the militant tasks assigned by the Party.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Rakwon Machine Complex.
					
					 He went round the room devoted to the history of the Oxygen Plant-Building Factory before looking round the Sheet Metal Processing Shop, the Heat Exchanger Shop, the Assembling Shop and various other production processes of the factory to learn about in detail with the technological updating and production there.
					
					 Watching the newly manufactured oxygen plant, he expressed great satisfaction with the fact that the workers of the complex produced a modern oxygen plant by their own efforts by giving full play to the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and highly praised their feats.
					
					 The fact that they have manufactured the 15,000-cubic-metre oxygen plant by their own efforts and with their own technology patently proves the great potential of the nation's industry which has been put on a high scientific and technological basis, he said, specifying an orientation and ways for completing the production of large oxygen plants earlier than schedule.
					
					 Seeing one by one the books on the labor campaigns of loyalty and a collection of poems that bear witness to the patriotic devotion made by the workers of the factory with pure conscience while manufacturing oxygen plants, he stressed that the DPRK's cause of building a thriving nation is sure to be successfully accomplished thanks to such heroic workers as the workers of the complex who are devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm to the drive for opening  the gate to a thriving nation by displaying the indomitable mental power.
					
					 He had a photo session with labor innovators of the complex.
					
					 Noting that the Party members and other working people in North Phyongan Province have made strenuous endeavors to carry out the militant tasks set forth by the Party, thereby doing a lot of work on all fronts of economic construction in recent years, he highly appreciated their achievements.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Phyong Hae, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Congratulations to Russian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Russian President
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Monday sent a congratulatory message to Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev, President of Russia, on his birthday.
					 The message says:
					
					 I extend congratulations to you on your birthday.
					
					 I believe that the relations between the DPRK and Russia will develop in the interests of the peoples of the two countries and wish you good health and success in your responsible work.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Pakistani Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Pakistani Ambassador to DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Noorullah Khan, ambassador of Pakistan to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Here
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) - A delegation of the Laos-Korea Friendship Association led by Vice-Chairman Khamphan Sittidampha, who is secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Youth Union, arrived here by air on Monday.
					 A delegation of the Mongolian Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun Idea led by President B. Davaadorj and a Chinese group of demonstration performance of Wushu led by Wang Yulong, vice-president of the Chinese Wushu Association, also arrived here today by air.

articles.title: International Trade Fair to Be Held
articles.content:
International Trade Fair to Be Held 
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The 5th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair will be held at the Three-Revolution Exhibition from Sept. 21 to 24.
					  It will bring together companies of the DPRK, China, Netherlands, Germany, Sweden, Britain, Australia, Austria, Italy, Indonesia, Vietnam, France, Finland, Poland and Hong Kong and Taipei of China.
					
					 On display there will be machine tools, electrical and electronic equipment, vehicles, petrochemicals, medicaments, daily necessities, foodstuffs, etc.

articles.title: Developing Industrial Art
articles.content:
Developing Industrial Art
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The national exhibition of successes in quality control was held at the Three-Revolution Exhibition of the DPRK some time ago. Hit industrial art pieces were displayed at the exhibition to draw the attention of experts.
					 Head of an office of the State Administration for Quality Management Choe Chi Ho told KCNA that the industrial art is ever developing under the unified guidance of the state, and added:
					
					 The state instituted the law and regulations on industrial art to provide a legal foundation for the development of industrial art.
					
					 On the basis of this, industrial art exhibitions, shows, prize contests, short courses, seminars and others were held throughout the country, registering remarkable successes.
					
					 Shown at the recent exhibition were a lot of designs of machines, textile and costume, architectural decoration and others which were of great significance in developing the national economy.
					
					 The designs were new and rich in the content and shape.
					
					 The Democratic People's Republic of Korea, which joined the Madrid Agreement Concerning the International Registration of Marks in June 1980 and the Hague Agreement Concerning the International Registration of Industrial Designs in May 1992, has conducted external interchange.
					
					 The designs on origins of Kaesong Koryo Insam, Paektusan Tuljjuk Liquor, Sindok Spring and others and designs of commodities including Unbangul Gum and Pomhyanggi Cosmetics are well reputed in foreign countries.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Celebrated
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Celebrated
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held by the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and the Russian Youth Association for the Study of the Juche Idea on Sept. 7 and 8 on the occasion of the 61st birthday of the DPRK. Meetings also took place in Laos, Finland and Sweden in that period on the same occasion. 
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 Petrov, secretary of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, said that President Kim Il Sung was the outstanding leader who made a great contribution to the development of the friendly relations between the DPRK and Russia, adding that the immortal exploits performed by the President, the father of socialist Korea, will remain shining forever.
					
					Nikolayev, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, noted that the history of the DPRK is the history of the revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung who founded the true government of the people and General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has successfully carried forward and developed the President's cause.
					
					 Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Youth Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, and other speakers said that the DPRK which has emerged a satellite launcher and a nuclear weapons state under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il is the country where the independence of the popular masses is fully ensured, stressing that the experience gained by the DPRK serves as a genuine model for the world progressive humankind aspiring after independence at present.
					
					 The chairman of the Laos-Korea Friendship Association said that the DPRK is the country where all the people are single-mindedly united around their leader and a powerful country which no formidable enemy dares provoke.
					
					 The chairman of the Finland-Korea Association extended full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their drive to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012.
					
					 The chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association said that the Korean people beat back the U.S. imperialists' armed invasion under the wise leadership of the President and built on this land socialism, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings held in Russia, Finland and Sweden.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Observed in Syria and Myanmar
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Observed in Syria and Myanmar
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Figures of Syria and Myanmar released statements on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 Saber Ballul, department head of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus in Syria, in a statement on Sept. 8 said that the DPRK was founded on the basis of the Juche idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung, adding that thanks to the Juche idea, the popular masses' cause of independence has made a victorious advance and socialism in the DPRK won one victory after another though socialist countries collapsed in Eastern Europe at the end of the 20th century.
					
					 The founding of the Songun idea was the key to the birth of the DPRK and the firm defence of the gains of the Korean revolution, he noted, adding that thanks to the Songun idea, the Korean people could liberate the country, win a victory in the war fought against the U.S. and further boost the capability for self-defence.
					
					He stressed that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has developed in depth the Songun idea fathered by the President.
					
					 A director of a company in Myanmar in a statement issued on Sept. 7 praised the DPRK founded by the President as a dignified and Juche-oriented socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence. He expressed belief that the DPRK would surely open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Nigeria
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by the N. K. Publishing House in Enugu of Nigeria.
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Sept. 7.

articles.title: Anniversary of Death of Kim Jong Suk Observed in Mexico
articles.content:
Anniversary of Death of Kim Jong Suk Observed in Mexico
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism issued bulletin titled "Life of Total Dedication," carrying a portrait of woman commander of Mt. Paektu,  on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of death of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine. 
					 The bulletin said in an article that the whole life of Kim Jong Suk was a life totally dedicated to the freedom, liberation and prosperity of the country, adding that she participated in the anti-Japanese armed struggle to liberate the country, earning her fame as an anti-Japanese woman commander.
					
					 After the liberation of the country she visited factories, towns and villages in order to implement the line of nation-building laid down by President Kim Il Sung and energetically aroused the people to the building of a new country till the last moments of her life, it pointed out. 
					
					 Recalling that she deemed it as her noblest mission to protect the President, the bulletin noted that at the critical moments when enemy rifles were leveled on the headquarters during days of the anti-Japanese armed struggle, she protected the commander by becoming a shield. 
					
					 Her noble life of total dedication will always be remembered not only by the Korean people but by progressive humankind, it concluded.

articles.title: Changed Name of Railway Station
articles.content:
Changed Name of Railway Station
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung arrived at the then Namchang Railway Station on his way of field guidance one day in August of Juche 62 (1973).
					 While talking with the officials greeting him, the President suddenly asked them the station name.
					
					 An official replied that it was Namchang Railway Station. The President asked again why it was named Namchang, saying that the name of the place was Pukchang.
					
					 Another official said that it was called Namchang Railway Station as it was located south of the then Pukchang Thermal Power Plant. After listening to him, the President told that as it was called Namchang, travelers to Pukchang might be confused.
					
					 Some days ago, students coming to the plant for study, unable to decide whether they detrained, had gone to the other station and come back to Namchang Railway Station.
					
					 Nevertheless, the officials had not thought they would change the name of the station.
					
					 Seeing through minds of the officials, the President said that if it was called Namchang Railway Station, the thermal power plant and other industrial establishments there should be named after Namchang. Then he suggested calling the station as Pukchang Railway Station.
					
					 The officials were deeply moved to see that the President paid deep attention even to the name of a railway station so as not to give any slightest inconvenience to the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona la Unidad Combinada No.597 de marina
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona la Unidad Combinada No.597 de marina
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito la Unidad Combinada No. 597 de las fuerzas navales del EPC y presencio las maniobras de movilidad de esta.
					Luego de hacer conocimiento del estado de cumplimiento del deber de la unidad, el Comandante Supremo subio al mirador donde escucho explicaciones sobre el plan de desarrollo de las maniobras por parte del almirante de las fuerzas navales y presencio las maniobras de movilidad.
					
					Las maniobras mostraron bien la rotunda decision y la capacidad de implacable golpe de los marineros del EPC desbordantes del impetu de aniquilar de un golpe a los agresores si estos invaden nuestros mares, aunque sea poco, y el poderio de la industria de autodefensa nacional.
					
					Al ver los ejercicios de los valientes marineros, el Dirigente se mostro muy satisfecho de que todos los uniformados estan bien preparados tanto en lo politico e ideologico como en lo militar y tecnico para frustrar de un golpe cualquier invasion inesperada de los enemigos y defender inexpugnablemente la patria socialista.
					
					Tras evaluar altamente los exitos de entrenamiento, presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia para fortalecer aun mas el heroico EPC como las invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					Subrayo que nuestras fuerzas navales, que  partieron desde el cero despues de la liberacion, crecieron como las poderosas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias dispuestas de los modernos medios de ataque y defensa capaces de frustrar a tiempo cualquier agresion de los enemigos y anadio que gracias a que el invencible ejercito defiende como muralla de acero la linea de defensa de la patria, nuestra patria socialista prosperara eternamente como el baluarte invencible.
					
					Revisando los buques de guerra que regresan luego de terminar los ejercicios, el Comandante Supremo envio cordial saludo a los marineros.
					
					Se encontro con los militares participantes en las   maniobras y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, el jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, el primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, los generales de ejercito del EPC Kim Myong Guk, Kim Won Hong, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su y otros miembros directivos del ejercito, los secretarios Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, los jefes y primeros subjefes de departamento y otros cuadros directivos, del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente ruso
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente ruso
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio el dia 14 un mensaje al presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev, para felicitarle su cumpleanos. 
					  La misiva sigue:
					
					  Le envio a usted mis felicitaciones con motivo de su cumpleanos. 
					
					  Convencido de que las relaciones Corea-Rusia se desarrollaran conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de los dos paises, le deseo a Vd. buena salud y exitos en su labor responsable.

articles.title: V Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Otonal de Pyongyang
articles.content:
V Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Otonal de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ATCC) -- La V Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Otonal de Pyongyang tendra lugar del dia 21 al 24 en la capitalina Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones.
					En la ocasion participaran las companias de Corea, China, Holanda, Alemania, Suecia, Gran Bretana, Australia, Austria, Italia, Indonesia, Vietnam, Francia, Finlandia, Polonia, Hong Kong de China y Taipei China.
					
					Se exhibiran alli las maquinas herramientas, equipos electricos y electronicos, medios de transporte, productos petroquimicos, medicinas, articulos de uso diario, alimentos, etc.

articles.title: Bellas artes industriales en desarrollo
articles.content:
Bellas artes industriales en desarrollo
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Llamaron la vista de los especialistas las obras destacadas en la creacion de bellas artes industriales participantes en la Exposicion Nacional de Exitos en el Control de la Calidad recien efectuada en la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones de Corea.
					El jefe de seccion de la Direccion Estatal de Supervision de la Calidad, Choe Chi Ho, senalo que se desarrollan cada dia mas las bellas artes industriales bajo la unica guia del Estado y continuo:
					
					El Estado definio las leyes y reglas de este sector y echo la base legal para su desarrollo.
					
					A base de esto, en el sector se lograron numerosos exitos librandose activamente las exposiciones nacionales de bellas artes industriales, concursos, cursillos, simposios, etc.
					
					En la presente exposicion fueron presentados  numerosos disenos incluyendo los de los productos mecanicos, los de vestuario textil y los de decoracion arquitectonica.
					
					Estos son nuevos contenidos y abundantes formas.
					
					La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ingreso en junio de 1980 en el Acuerdo de Madrid sobre el registro internacional de marcas y en mayo de 1992 en el Acuerdo de Haya sobre el registro internacional de los disenos  industriales y desarrolla el intercambio con el extranjero.
					
					Los dibujos de lugares de origen de productos incluyendo Insam (ginseng) Coryo de Kaesong, el licor de arandano Paektusan, el agua mineral Sindok y otros de mercancias como el chicle Unbangul y cosmeticos Pomhyanggi gozan de buena reputacion exterior.
